item.title: Jesus H Christ
item.description: Most viral edit: Thanks for the upvotes and accolades. I should have included a news article about the arrest, my bad. He was arrested as part of a sex trafficking operation. Here’s a quick summary: https://www.yahoo.com/news/articles/bloomington-police-arrest-30-human-191210953.html Original post: https://bsky.app/profile/atrupar.com/post/3mejugdtqms2c Sorry I had to cut off 6 seconds. Imgur video upload hates me. Abolish every fucking 3 letter govt agency in charge of our security. Fuck the DHS, Fuck ICE, Fuck the FBI, Fuck the DEA, Fuck the TSA, Fuck whatever else I’m too mad to recall. 9/11 broke the already fragile brains of our national security apparatus and every single expert ringing the alarms bells about these agencies has been proven correct (I shouldn’t have to clarify that this criticism excludes whatever the fascist pasty has to say). The ever expanding scope of surveillance, ballooning budgets, violations of federal and state laws, violations of constitutional rights, construction of modern concentration camps, dystopian security contracts with tech companies, and outright fucking murder of Americans and immigrants, etc etc has made America more unsafe than it was before the agencies had god like powers. Power corrupts, and the US security state has completed a speed run of that phrase.

item.title: For those who will enjoy after…
item.description:
#memes #socially_awesome_awkward_penguin Back in August I ordered a vinyl record set for Clair Obscur: Expedition 33. I don’t usually care for the music of a video game, well, halo 3 was fantastic too, but this is different. That game was a masterpiece and the music is no different. No other soundtrack would I listen to actively at work when I’m lesson planning or grading.
#socially_awkward_awesome_penguin I have a small group of friends who played it so not many would appreciate this. My wife doesn’t understand the game so she wouldn’t fully appreciate this.
IT CAME!!!!
I just wanted to share this with you all!

item.title: Hint: Its the rise of fascism
item.description: Optimism among U.S. adults has sunk to a record low, according to a new Gallup survey. The poll, released Tuesday, found that less than six in 10 respondents anticipate high-quality lives in five years as of 2025. That marks the lowest rating on the subject since Gallup began surveying Americans on it in 2009 and a drop of 9.1 percentage points since 2020. Optimism dropped from 68.3 percent that year to 67.7 percent in 2021 and 63.1 percent in 2022, amid the COVID-19 pandemic. The metric peaked in 2016, when nearly 69 percent of respondents reported anticipating high-quality lives in five years — up almost 6 percentage points from 2009, when the country was in the midst of the financial crisis. From 2024 to 2025, Hispanic adults saw a six-point drop in optimism, while white adults saw a 4.6-point decrease and Black adults saw a 2.2-percentage point decline. That comes as President Trump’s immigration crackdown has targeted Hispanic communities nationwide, particularly in Democratic-run cities such as Los Angeles and Chicago. Backlash against the Trump administration’s immigration policies has intensified in the wake of federal immigration officers fatally shooting two U.S. citizens, Renee Good and Alex Pretti, in Minneapolis last month. Meanwhile, optimism among Democrats declined by 7.6 points from 2024 to last year, while it increased by nearly 1 point among Republicans and decreased by 1.5 percentage points among independents. That follows a pattern from 2020 to 2021, when Republicans’ optimism dropped by 5.9 points and Democrats’ optimism rose by 4.4 points as former President Biden took office. With less than eight months before the midterms, Trump and the GOP are battling this drop in optimism — specifically over the state of the economy — and recent historical trends that show the president’s party loses congressional seats two years into his term. “Presidents, whether it’s Republican or Democrat, when they win, it doesn’t make any difference. They seem to lose the midterms,” Trump told conservative talk show host Will Cain on Fox News last month in Iowa. While Trump told NBC News in an interview released Sunday that he is “proud” of the economy, inflation, at 2.7 percent, remains above the Federal Reserve’s target of 2 percent and unemployment rose from 4 percent in January 2025 to 4.4 percent in December 2025. A survey from NPR/PBS News/Marist released last week also found that nearly 60 percent of respondents disapprove of the president’s performance on the economy, an increase of 2 percentage points from the same poll conducted a month prior. The Gallup results are based on four quarterly surveys conducted throughout last year with 22,125 U.S. adults. The margin of error is 0.5 percent for the entire survey, while it is between 1 and 2 percent for race and ethnicity and political identity subgroups.

27 Man Tax: Shawn Hatosy
“The price of hating other human beings is loving oneself less.” - Eldridge Cleaver So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work, zero income. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've honestly been my lifeline. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me

item.title: So much for that pesky 4th amendment
item.description:
https://www.politico.com/news/2026/02/09/a-complete-non-starter-white-house-draws-red-lines-in-dhs-funding-talks-as-shutdown-looms-00772302 If you don't have enough legal reason to get a warrant, then you don't have a legal reason to bust down someone's door. This is literally the reason these amendments exist, because the British crown was busting down people's doors and hauling them away because they disagreed with the 'authorities'.
And it's all to cover up the kid-rape club they had going on. I'm so fucking sick of this. Release the files. Redactions are evidence tampering. DOJ is aiding and abetting the continued escape of child rapists.
item.dc:creator: fractalsphere

item.title: Fubar Pac: That one time when Republicans, panicking about getting stomped in the upcoming midterm elections, attempted to force the SAVE America Act through the Senate, a bill which threatens to eliminate voting rights for millions of Americans.
item.description: The SAVE Act is a solution in search of a problem. Sold as a way to make elections more secure, the restrictive legislation would bar people from registering to vote unless they are able to show a passport or a birth certificate with a name matching their photo.
item.dc:creator: OceansRust

item.title: It was racist.
item.dc:creator: mocosoft

item.title: Over a decade in the making
item.description: About 14 years ago, I started on a journey of acceptance. I accepted who I was, and I've fought to be who I am. I've lost family, friends and my marriage. It's been the hardest thing in my life to do but I had to be true to myself. To live as a guy was a lie. That wasn't doing anyone any good. Now, I'm finally happy with who I am inside and out (for the most part), my ex wife is my best friend, my children are loved and excel in everything they do. I still have more to do to feel whole but hopefully in time I can afford those things. There's no point to my story but just to say, be your truth. Edit: Nice, my post hit 420 up votes!
item.dc:creator: BaddieVillain
